word: H4754 - מָרָא - mârâʼ - maw-raw' - Be filthy - அசுத்தமாயிரு

sections.paragraph: 1) (Hiphil) to beat (the air), flap (the wings); the meaning is uncertain.
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to rebel; hence (through the idea of maltreating) to whip, that is, lash (self with wings, as the ostrich in running): - be filthy, lift up self.
